Question: Returning to New York in 1958, this person successfully recruited Cannonball Adderley for his standing group.
Hints: In 1963, this person' longtime rhythm section of Kelly, Chambers, and Cobb departed.
In 1989, this person was interviewed on 60 Minutes by Harry Reasoner.
This person had an operation to remove polyps from his larynx in October 1955.
